mapper.update:
update K_DEPT
DNAME = #{dname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DPERSON = #{dperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROFESORNUM = #{profesornum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FPROFESORNUM = #{fprofesornum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LECTURERNUM = #{lecturernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TANUM = #{tanum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
KESHI = #{keshi,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JIGOU = #{jigou,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where DID = #{did,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update K_DEPT set DNAME = #{dname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DPERSON = #{dperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROFESORNUM = #{profesornum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FPROFESORNUM = #{fprofesornum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LECTURERNUM = #{lecturernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TANUM = #{tanum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, KESHI = #{keshi,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, JIGOU = #{jigou,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where DID = #{did,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
